definition: one that is suggestive of or suited to an earlier time or style
examples: his manners were a throwback to a more polite era

definition: reversion to an earlier type or phase : atavism
an instance or product of atavistic reversion
to delay the progress or advance of : check
to cause to rely : make dependent
examples: they are thrown back upon … native intelligence

definition: to revert to an earlier type or phase
